      • checkDatabaseVersion

        protected boolean checkDatabaseVersion()
        Deprecated.
        Description copied from class: CatalogDatabase
        Returns true if the database version is current, false otherwise. If this method returns false, the database will be rebuilt with a call to CatalogDatabase.dropTables() followed by CatalogDatabase.buildTables(). Subclasses may override this method to support their own versioning mechanism.

        The default implementation compares the version of the database via this.database.DatabaseIface.getVersion() against CatalogDatabase.CATALOG_VERSION.

        Overrides:
        checkDatabaseVersion in class CatalogDatabase
        Returns:
        true if the database version is current, false otherwise.

      • setDatabaseVersion

        protected void setDatabaseVersion()
        Deprecated.
        Description copied from class: CatalogDatabase
        Sets the database versioning to the current version. Subclasses may override this method to support their own versioning mechanism.

        The default implementation sets the version of the database via this.database. DatabaseIface.setVersion(int) with CatalogDatabase.CATALOG_VERSION.

        Overrides:
        setDatabaseVersion in class CatalogDatabase

      • close

        public void close()
        Deprecated.
        Overrides:
        close in class CatalogDatabase

      • dropTables

        protected void dropTables()
        Deprecated.
        Description copied from class: CatalogDatabase
        Drops the tables present in the database. This method is invoked in the constructor when the database version is not current.
        Overrides:
        dropTables in class CatalogDatabase

      • buildTables

        protected void buildTables()
        Deprecated.
        Description copied from class: CatalogDatabase
        Builds the tables for the database. This method is invoked in the constructor when the database lacks the catalog table or when if the database version is not current.

        The default implementation invokes CatalogDatabase.createCatalogTable() and returns.

        Overrides:
        buildTables in class CatalogDatabase
